name: Circus
summary: Circus is an arcade game released by Exidy in 1977. The game is a re-themed variant of Atari's Breakout, where the player controls a seesaw and clown in order to pop all the balloons in the level. The game has been copied and released under different names by numerous other companies in both the United States and Japan.
info:
• 平台: Atari 2600
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1977年
  • 游戏设计师: Edward Valeau, Howell Ivy
  • 发行: Exidy
